modName: Shriven Under The Iron Pot - An ESO Inspired Book
summary: An unknown writer has written an account of a mysterious hero of the 2nd Era. Go! Read the tale.
descriptionHtml:
[line]
[center][/center][center][u][b][font=Times New Roman][size=4]
What is this mod?[/size]
[/font][/b][/u][font=Times New Roman][size=2]Well, to begin with... Wouldn't really call it a 'mod' per say, this is simply a short story I have written about Cadwell. The crazed knight from ESO. As he is one of my favorite characters.[/size][/font]
[line]
[u][b][font=Times New Roman][size=4]What is the story about?
[/size][/font][/b][/u][font=Times New Roman][size=4][size=2]The story is a simple overview of who Cadwell was, giving him a moment to shine in TES V!
[/size][/size][/font][u][b][font=Times New Roman][u][b][font=Times New Roman][size=4]
Where can I find this story?
[/size][/font][/b][/u][/font][/b][/u][size=2][font=Times New Roman]It is said that the writer traveled to Winterhold to study the Psijic Order whom Cadwell was involved with, through his great friend Vanus Galerion. A check around the local inn may be a start!
[line]

-Enjoy!

[b][i]This is my first addition to Skyrim, so I hope you have a nice time reading what I've written. If you find any grammatical mistakes please do share them! There's bound to be some, and any ideas or suggestions for future stories or additions let me know![/i][/b][/font][/size][b][i]
[/i][/b][/center]
[line]
author: Tristorm
